entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
